bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with cu xin 醋心 , vinegar center. Tai ping hui min he ji Recipe book. Northern Song, ju fang 1107~1110. 太平惠民和劑局方 9: 小地黃丸，治妊娠酸 心，吐清水，腹痛，不能飲食 , “Pills with di huang and only a small number [of further ingredients] cure sour center (i.e. stomach) during pregnancy, vomiting of clear water, abdominal pain, and an inability to drink or eat”.
